*p*It is the wish of the *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*that they as a *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*may be Recognized as the *person_mentioned*proprietors */person_mentioned*of the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*, that the persons names assigned to the Memorial may be Recognized as *person_mentioned*Directors of the company*/person_mentioned*, the *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*Concisted first of *person_mentioned*52 persons*/person_mentioned* towit *person_mentioned*Nelson Paterson*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*William Campbell*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Ira Ingram*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*J. *p*After *person_mentioned*Andrew Erwin */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Robert Leftwich*/person_mentioned* went on to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*the *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*held a meeting and *person_mentioned*Twenty two persons*/person_mentioned* more became interested whose names I have not but amongst them is *person_mentioned*Andrew Hynes*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Richard Hyde*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*John Shelby*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*James Overton*/person_mentioned* who is now *person_mentioned*Directors of the company*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*After the Return of *person_mentioned*Mr. Leftwich*/person_mentioned* from the *location_mentioned*Republick of Mexico */location_mentioned*to the *location_mentioned*united States*/location_mentioned* those *person_mentioned*74 share holders */person_mentioned*had a meting and Subdivided Each share in to 8 Parts making 592 in all and distributed them amongst their Particular *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*in Certificates intending that Each-Certificate should entitle a *person_mentioned*man */person_mentioned*to Save [sic]*location_mentioned* a League square of land,*/location_mentioned* they having the Requisate Qualifications prescribed by the colonization Law—and these persons amongst whome thease Certificates wer divided Paid in the Sum or Sums of mony mentioned in the *person_mentioned*Companies */person_mentioned*Memorial, it is therefore praied by the *person_mentioned*company*/person_mentioned* that Every *person_mentioned*person */person_mentioned*holding one of those certificates shall have a preference of Settleing in the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*to one that has none until the 592 is setled and then the ballance of the *person_mentioned*800 Families */person_mentioned*to be setled in the ordinary way they at the Same time complying with the laws of the *location_mentioned*Land*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*they also desire that the *location_mentioned*boundery of the colony */location_mentioned*may be Extended making the *location_mentioned*Colorado River the Boundery on the west*/location_mentioned* and if any further Extention can be added in any way it will be much advantage to the *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*to do so—and be thankfully received I am Authorised by the company to Vouch to the Government in their name that they will introduce none but honest industrious *person_mentioned*Agriculturists */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*stock Raisers*/person_mentioned* the most of whom is wealthy, and that the population shall be Immediately brought into the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*to an amount sufficient to defend that [part] of the *location_mentioned*Frontier*/location_mentioned*, that all due faith and obeidence shall be observed toward the Constitution and laws of the Government and due Respect paid to all Constituted *person_mentioned*Authorities*/person_mentioned**/p*.
*p*from your Experience in the Buisness of collonizeing and knowing as you do the Foliey of the Government it is much safer for me to depend entirely on your Judgement to point out the Necessary Requisites for the advancement of the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*which I hope you will attend to than to prescribe my self should the Change be made according to the Prayre of the memorial you will pleas to inform me by letter Immediately that I may communicate with the *person_mentioned*company*/person_mentioned* and be preparing for the *location_mentioned*Settlement*/location_mentioned*-*/p* *p**location_mentioned*San Felipe De Austin */location_mentioned*the *date_mentioned n="09-10-1827">10 Sept 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
